title: Head Shoulders Knees and Toes
short_plot_summary: In this popular children's song, body parts are pointed to as they are sung, teaching kids the names of their body parts through a catchy tune.
explanation: A shrug, representing the Head and Shoulders in the song
A leg, representing the Knees in the song
A foot, representing the toes in the song
Eyes, representing the Eyes in the song
An ear, representing the ears in the song
